name: Sassenpoort
info: A well-preserved medieval city gate from the late 14th century, once part of the city's fortifications.

name: Peperbus Tower (Onze Lieve Vrouwekerk)
info: A striking 15th-century church with a towering spire offering panoramic views of the city.

name: Museum de Fundatie
info: A former palace of justice, now a museum housing an impressive art collection.
